subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Golf
Blacks
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: He joined the PGA Tour in 1963, just two years after the color barrier was broken, and in 1964 became the first black golfer to win a tour event.
snippet: He joined the PGA Tour in 1963, just two years after the color barrier was broken, and in 1964 became the first black golfer to win a tour event.
